attributes.action: Enforce covid-19 rules for hunting and shooting
attributes.additional_details: its called hypocrisy, these people are no different than anyone else who has to abide by the law. Their bloodless for sport should not be satiated at the risk of other people's lives
attributes.background: the fact that the 6 person rule is not enforced for hunting and shooting is despicable. It is in plain sight of the public at large who are AGAINST unnecessary animal cruelty .

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551212
